synopsis.text: Anne, an imaginative and spirited orphan, finds herself on a journey to Prince Edward Island to live with the Cuthberts, who had initially requested to adopt a boy. Despite the unexpected mix-up, Anne's vibrant personality and boundless imagination begin to win over her new family and the residents of the idyllic countryside. As she navigates the challenges of growing up from age 11 to 17, Anne forms lasting friendships, attends school, and discovers her own unique path in life. Faced with adversity and the possibility of being sent away, Anne must make a difficult decision and perhaps find a new dream in the process. Join Anne as she embarks on a heartwarming and inspiring journey of self-discovery, resilience, and the true meaning of family in this enchanting anime adaptation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
